titleStmt.title: A funeral sermon preached upon the death of Mrs. Rebecka Goddard, November the 13th. 1692 At Joyners-Hall. By Tho. Harrison.
titleStmt.author: Harrison, Thomas, fl. 1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J. Harris at the Harrow in the Poultrey,
